step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with your arm stretched overhead and fingers open.
You're doing great! Keep your arms extended overhead and fingers spread wide.
Nice work making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down. Remember to inhale.
Excellent! Stretch your arms back overhead and exhale as you relax.
Good job completing the first repetition. Keep up the great work.
Great start to your second repetition. Remember to sit or stand comfortably with your arm stretched overhead and fingers open.
You're doing well. Keep your arms extended overhead and fingers spread wide.
Fantastic! You're making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down. Remember to inhale.
Excellent execution. Stretch your arms back overhead and exhale as you relax.
Well done completing all repetitions! You're doing a great job with this exercise.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms stretched overhead with fingers open, then make a fist and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you push down. Finish by stretching arms overhead again while exhaling.
